Istrati Lucian Gavrilă Maria Harja [...] Marius Ciocan View INFLUENCE OF TEMPERATURE, FAT AND WATER CONTENT ON THE THERMAL CONDUCTIVITY OF SOME DAIRY PRODUCTS Article Full-text available Dec 2003 Lucian Gavrilă Adriana-Luminita Finaru Lăcrămioara Istrati [...] Marius Ciocan Most of the data concerning the properties of materials involved in the food processing industries are presented in tabular or graphical form. In these form, experimental data are difficult to use in calculus where properties' values are often and repeatedly necessary at different temperatures, i.e.: fluid flow, thermal balances, overall heat and/o...
